paragraphs.text: My name is Wojciech Szpila and I'm a web developer.
I will be happy to create a website or a mobile application for you.
If you would like to see my tech stack and learn more about me, click
I also encourage you to check out my projects
If you have any questions or would like to get in touch, click

about.heading: Something about me
paragraphs: In June 2021 I decided to try "something" in IT. I started with HTML and CSS courses on udemy.
I immediately started to like it and knew that I wanted to do it.
10 months after the start of learning, in May 2022, I got my first job as a programmer!
During this time I went through many courses, and the knowledge from them I used both at work and in my projects.
To this day I learn new things and develop my skills, which gives me incredible joy!
